name: Wilderness
storyline: Explore the vast open world and find hidden secrets and more things to do. Survive in the wild nature by playing as an animal or as a human. Play as an animal, and you will have the option to survive on your own or create your own herd. Have babies and protect them from predators. Play as a human and you will have to look for resources by hunting, fishing or other ways. Build your shelter, and customize your character and weapons. Explore the vast open world and find hidden secrets and more things to do.
summary: Survive in the wild nature by playing as an animal or as a human. Play as an animal and survive by your own or build a herb to stay protected. Have babies and protect them from predators. Play as a human and craft items, build a house, customize your character and more.
